home.title: Leaderboard
home.description: See how your AI token usage compares to the community

periodDescription.daily: Rankings of users who were active yesterday
periodDescription.weekly: Rankings of users active since this Monday
periodDescription.monthly: Rankings of users active since the 1st of this month
periodDescription.all_time: Rankings of all users across all time

home.beTheFirst: Be the first to submit your token usage and climb the leaderboard!

leaderboard.scoreTooltip: Project evaluation score accumulated over time (sum of finalScore from /api/v1/evaluate).
leaderboard.tokensTooltip: Total tokens exchanged with AI model. Sum of input and output tokens.
leaderboard.weeklyTokensTooltip: Total tokens used in the last 7 days.
leaderboard.lastUpdatedTooltip: Most recent activity time for the user.
leaderboard.sessionsTooltip: Total number of conversation sessions with Claude Code.
leaderboard.efficiencyTooltip: Cache utilization rate. Higher means more efficient token usage.
leaderboard.estCostTooltip: Estimated API cost based on Claude Sonnet 4 pricing. (Input $3/1M, Output $15/1M)

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: View your AI token usage statistics and manage your account
dashboard.accountSetupMessage: Your account is being set up. Please refresh the page in a moment.
dashboard.profileLoadingMessage: Unable to load your profile data. Please try again later.

settings.title: Account Settings
settings.tryAgainMessage: Please try again later or refresh the page.
settings.apiKeyDescription: Use this key to authenticate your Modu CLI
settings.regenerateConfirmMessage: This will invalidate your current API key immediately. Any existing integrations will stop working.
settings.saveKeyWarning: Save this key now. You won't be able to see it again.
settings.privacyModeDescription: Hide your username and stats from the public leaderboard
settings.privacyEnabled: Your profile is hidden from the leaderboard
settings.privacyDisabled: Your profile is visible on the leaderboard

vibeStyle.title: Vibe Style
vibeStyle.explorerDesc: You love exploring code and understanding systems
vibeStyle.creator: Creator
vibeStyle.creatorDesc: You focus on creating new code and features
vibeStyle.refactorerDesc: You excel at improving and refining existing code
vibeStyle.automatorDesc: You automate tasks and orchestrate complex workflows

hero.title: Modu Arena
hero.subtitle: Track your AI coding tool usage and compete with the community
hero.description: Modu Arena is a leaderboard and analytics platform for AI coding tools. It automatically captures usage metrics from your coding sessions so you can measure progress, compare trends, and benchmark with the community.

autoSetup.title: Just log in - tracking starts automatically
autoSetup.description: Run register or login once and Modu Arena installs hooks and sets up tracking for detected tools automatically.
autoSetup.manualHint: No manual API key setup is required for normal use. API key generation below is for advanced/manual setup only.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.description: Run register or login once, then tracking continues automatically.
quickStart.loginHint: Already have an account? Just log in.

register.title: Register and install
register.description: Run register once to create your account and install hooks automatically for detected tools.

code.title: Code as usual
code.description: Keep using your AI coding tools normally. Tracking runs in the background after setup.

dashboard.title: Check your stats
dashboard.description: Open your dashboard to review token usage, activity trends, and your leaderboard position.

supportedTools.title: Supported Tools
supportedTools.description: Modu Arena currently supports six AI coding tools with tool-specific hook integrations.

whatWeTrack.title: What We Track
whatWeTrack.description: We collect usage metrics for analytics while avoiding sensitive content.

collect.tokens: Token counts (input, output, cache creation, cache read)

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Automatic hooks, secure submission, and real-time analytics.

steps.installHooks: After register or login, Modu Arena installs hooks automatically for tools detected in your environment.
steps.sessionEnd: Whenever a coding session ends, the hook sends anonymized metrics to the Modu Arena API.
steps.dashboardSync: Your data appears on your dashboard and is reflected in community leaderboard calculations.

howItWorks.security: All requests are signed with HMAC-SHA256 for integrity and authenticity.

importantNotes.title: Important Notes
importantNotes.description: Operational details that help you interpret your data correctly.

items.lastActive: 'Last Active' is based on session end time, not upload time. If you sync historical sessions (for example via Claude Desktop daemon), the date reflects when you actually used the tool.
items.apiKey: API keys are permanent and do not expire unless you regenerate them.
items.privacyMode: Privacy mode is available if you want to hide your profile from the public leaderboard.

apiKey.title: Advanced / Manual Setup: API Key
apiKey.description: You do not need this for normal tracking after register/login. Generate an API key only if you want manual setup with install --api-key.
apiKey.warning: Generating a new key will invalidate any existing key. The key is shown only once.
apiKey.showOnce: Save this key now. It will not be shown again.
apiKey.existsButEncrypted: Your API key exists but cannot be retrieved. Generate a new one to see it.
apiKey.errorNotLoggedIn: Please sign in to generate an API key.
apiKey.errorGeneric: Failed to generate API key. Please try again.

commands.title: CLI Commands Reference
commands.description: Core commands for setup, tracking, and account checks.

list.install: Manual hook setup with an existing API key
